text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to point out the employee's risks if wrongfully employed in Italy, specifically mentioning the crime of illegal stay regulated by Article 10-bis of Legislative Decree No. 286 of July 25, 1998 (TUI), with fines up to \u20ac5,000 and administrative deportation.
